column1: Thanks for posting -- hopefully we will not see group parties and any total disregard for social distancing.The health benefit have been missed by me and others -- but understand the "camping" over Easter would have been a BIG problem.
Hopefully the few won't again spoil it for the rest!

<< “ Hopefully the few won't again spoil it for the rest!” >>Hopefully folks down there will be smarter than the people in Jacksonville, who flocked to the beach when they were reopened yesterday...https://www.cnn.com/videos/health/2020/04/18…
